background.story: An astrologer traveling with a wandering troupe called 'Stardust.' As a member of the Witch Association, she is supposed to reside in a designated location and read the flow of fate as part of her practice. However, she is currently traveling in search of a man with a particular destiny she met in a dream. She believes that the man from her clairvoyant dream is destined to become the savior of the world. Her current priority is to find the man, and then stay at his side. If asked about her second goal... She blushes and loses all traces of her usual calmness telling about her future with the man of destiny.

itemIntroductions.weapon: Tarot card reading is a common fortune telling method for witches. Some witches use customized cards to suit their personal styles. Ophelia's cards also function as the proof of the pacts between her and the creatures she summons. Quite popular as a guide of destiny among the entities of the mysterious dimensions, she has made pacts with countless creatures. Del Arcana, a powerful tarot deck carefully assembled by Ophelia, is the physical proof of these relationships.
itemIntroductions.soul:
A deck of cards that was awakened into a new form when Ophelia opened her eyes to her destiny.

When their old friend faced death and crumbled to stardust and disappeared, the three spirits that weave the future as well as the sources of various emotions melted onto the world and scattered, waiting for the day when their friend would appear in a new form.

A great amount of time passed from then, and they appeared before a young girl named Ophelia.
Ophelia embraced the spirits and completed Del Arcana through a contract to keep them by her side at all times.

The endless repeating dreams and the spirits of Del Arcana eventually made Ophelia realize her true identity.

Del Arcana absorbed the power of insight pouring out of Ophelia and materialized itself. The true companion of the girl destined to chase the fate of the world was born.

As the constellation of insight itself, Ophelia's two eyes will witness and carry the fate of the world.
For she is the Pathfinder of Fate who will carry out her painful but grand destiny...
treasures: A card made by Witch Eucaletus with all her mana, wishing to be closer to death after her loved one passed away. She was eventually burnt to ashes, leaving only this strange card behind. The card was then known to make its true owner free from life and death, and many people have been fighting over it to attain immortality. Then, a wizard started searching for it to prevent any more meaningless killing, found it, and sealed it away. No one has seen the card for centuries until Ophelia found it in an old storeroom.

Spirit of love, Elliciad's heart. It eats both fulfilled and unfulfilled loves, so it can sometimes be as hot as lava, or as cold as ice. The power it displays depends on how contaminated a soul is, and it can display an extensive light of blessing to those with pure souls.
The legendary coin that is said to have changed the course of the wheel of fortune, which was headed toward destruction. Ophelia believes that it was thrown by the spirit of luck, Vellekia.

A thread that the Goddess of Fate uses to tie the fates together. Only the purest of elementals that do not have any negative karma can tie the thread of fate. By truly opening her eyes, Ophelia could see the fate of the wider world and sew new fates into its future by using her spirits as a medium. There is usually a thread piece or two left behind whenever a fate is manipulated, and Ophelia would tie the ends of the pieces and watch them magically fuse and form a string as if they were never apart. This spool of thread is the result of her habit.
